item.title: Render LaTeX using KaTeX
item.description: Enable katex by adding katex = "true" to the front matter +++ katex = "true" +++ If you want to enable KaTeX or MathJax for all post, add katex = ture or math = true in config.toml in [params] section. It’s almost a dropin alternative to the mathjax solution,you should just choose one of them. Inline math looks like this This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} =1$ This is text with inline math $\sum_{n=1}^{\infty} 2^{-n} = 1$
